description: A humorous take on Russians' resilience to cold weather.
title: A Mild Chill
n_1: Ivan steps outside, feeling the cold breeze.
n_2: Mikhail joins Ivan, both unbothered by the snow.
n_3: They engage in typical winter activities, unfazed.
n_4: As they sip tea, they smile, embracing the cold.
c2_4: Just a normal day for us.
